rule.q: What does FDA say about dosing in severe hepatic impairment?

answer: Use caution in severe hepatic impairment; adjust dosing per labeling. Pediatric dosing must follow age‑appropriate guidance; avoid adult formulations in infants. Report serious adverse events to FDA MedWatch.
